thread.title: S.F. supervisor hopes Prop. B serves as model for private sector
thread.title_full: S.F. supervisor hopes Prop. B serves as model for private sector - San Francisco Chronicle

author: John Wildermuth
title: S.F. supervisor hopes Prop. B serves as model for private sector
text:
Photo: Carlos Avila Gonzalez, The Chronicle Supervisor Katy Tang says the city's parental leave policy isn't fair to workers. Supervisor Katy Tang says the city's parental leave policy isn't...
Supervisor Katy Tang already is looking past the Nov. 3 vote on Proposition B, which would expand the city’s parental leave policy to allow both new parents to take the full 12 weeks now allowed under city rules. Supervisor Katy Tang says the city's parental leave policy isn't fair to workers. Supervisor Katy Tang says the city's parental leave policy isn't...
